title: Cryoablation shows promise in treating low-risk breast cancers

title_detail.value: Cryoablation shows promise in treating low-risk breast cancers

summary: Cryoablation -- the destruction of cancer cells through freezing -- shows early indications of effectiveness in treating women with low-risk breast cancers. Researchers said that over the four years of the study, there has only been one case of cancer recurrence out of 180 patients.
